message:
—— animelodies1


终于到吉他啦><

animelodies1是一位在youtube上十分高产+活跃的吉他演奏家

演奏视频基本上是电吉他、民谣吉他一半一半。

曲目覆盖范围非常广，基本的Galgame和Anime名作都有涉及

大部分演奏曲目在视频下方都有放出谱子下载链接，某些曲目还会将谱子贴在视频中以供参考

如果你同样喜欢吉他，订阅他吧。


———————————————————————————————————————————————————

animelodies1的演奏视频：

Youtube视频主页

Bilibili选集

个人挑选的十几首比较有代表性的曲目。

———————————————————————————————————————————————————


个人推荐：


民谣吉他：

Gosick ED 1 - Resuscitated Hope guitar cover (solo)

古典风格完美演绎

Fate/stay night ED - Anata ga Ita Mori guitar cover (solo)

Gosick ED 2 - unity guitar cover (solo)

Little Busters! EX Saya ED - Saya's Song guitar cover (solo)

Shakugan no Shana Movie (Featured Song) - Akai Namida guitar cover (solo)

Dragon Ball ED - Romantic Ageru yo guitar cover (solo)


电吉他：

To Aru Majutsu no Index II OP 1 - No buts! guitar cover

开场高能

Shakugan no Shana II OP 1 - JOINT guitar cover

Another OP - Kyoumu Densen guitar cover

Mirai Nikki [Future Diary] OP 2 - Dead END guitar cover

Steins;Gate OP - Hacking to the Gate guitar cover


民谣吉他+电吉他：


Shakugan no Shana III Final ED 1 - I'll believe guitar cover (overdub)

Muv-Luv Alternative OP - Asu e no Houkou guitar cover


———————————————————————————————————————————————————

animelodies1Collabo的演奏视频：

Youtube视频主页

如你所见，多了个collabo就意味着基本都是合奏，视频数量虽然不多，但质量绝对没话说。

———————————————————————————————————————————————————


个人推荐：


穢翼のユースティア OP - Asphodelus （コラボ）

棒极了


はつゆきさくら OP - Hesitation Snow （コラボ）

温暖人心出血樱，比原版软了不少，也是相当好听


Fate/Zero OP 2 - to the beginning

演绎出了那份古典与凝重
title: [订阅推荐] animelodies1 Guitar Play [Anime/Galgame曲目] [吉他]
userSign: (フォーリンダウン・レイディバグ)
